snippet: Formula One is often accused of neglecting its fans and being racing for the rich. But thanks to an independent initiative called F1 FanZone, in recent years certain race venues have brought the circuit's excitement into the city streets. A reminder...
abstract: Formula One is often accused of neglecting its fans and being racing for the rich. But thanks to an independent initiative called F1 FanZone, in recent years certain race venues have brought the circuit's excitement into the city streets. A reminder that sport is all about fun.

headline.main: Not Just a Race for the Rich: Welcome to the F1 FanZone
